alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LYCOMING AND NORTHWESTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williamsport, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Montoursville around 515 PM EDT. Loyalsockville around 525 PM EDT. Barbours around 540 PM EDT. Kettle Creek Gorge around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include South Williamsport, Garden View, Hillsgrove and Little League World Series Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
